Plantar Fasciitis

Plantar Fasciitis is a condition that is not touched in any market. It’s a tough condition to get relief from when you have no direction. When we are talking about the foot, it’s THE most used body part in the entire body. The foot is required to do everything in life; Walk, run, bike, stand for long periods, golf, and the list goes on and on. Most medical treatments out there today are addictive pain killers, cortisone injections, and useless splints. Having a program designed to treat plantar fasciitis pain not only makes you the “Go-To Clinic” for that condition, but it will increase your new patients through the door.

Our at-home/in-clinic program is designed for the patient to have the ability to treat themselves at home 75% of the time, coming into the office minimally, and getting better clinical results with research-backed technologies. With our Plantar Fasciitis niche, you will be able to combine with other niches like weight loss, gut health, and more, by using practice automation strategies, allowing you to collect more while working less.
